name: Mexican burger
description: Burger with cheese, ham, avocado, grilled onion, tomato, lettuce, mayo, mustard and a side of fries.

name: Hotdogs
description: 2 hotdogs with asada meat, cheese, raw and grilled onion, tomato, cilantro and avocado.

name: Wings
description: Choose between buffalo, BBQ, mango habanero, tamarindo, lemon pepper or teriyaki, comes with fries.
